alert.note: Alert for Beaver Island and surrounding islands; Eastern Mackinac; Emmet; Southeast Chippewa; Western Mackinac (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Lakeshore Flood Warning issued December 16 at 3:18AM EST until December 16 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Gaylord
info.description: ...LAKESHORE FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Significant lakeshore flooding. * WHERE...Emmet, Beaver Island and surrounding islands, Southeast Chippewa, Western Mackinac and Eastern Mackinac Counties. * WHEN...Until 7 PM EST this evening. * IMPACTS...Numerous roads closed and low lying property including parking lots, lawns, and homes and businesses will be inundated near the lake. Some shoreline erosion will occur.
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.

area.areaDesc: Beaver Island and surrounding islands; Eastern Mackinac; Emmet; Southeast Chippewa; Western Mackinac
